Testimonial.title: Loved by many
Testimonial.Magnus: AskPDFs.io has completely transformed how I interact with documents. The AI-powered search and summarization make finding information effortless. It's a game-changer for research and productivity!
Testimonial.Anna: I love how intuitive and fast AskPDFs.io is! It saves me hours by instantly answering questions from long PDFs. Whether for work or study, this tool is a must-have!
Testimonial.Harun: No more endless scrolling through PDFs! AskPDFs.io gives me precise answers in seconds. It's reliable, efficient, and incredibly easy to use. Highly recommended!

HomePage.underTitle: Achieve more in less time with Ask PDFs.

preview.featureAlert: Enchance your questions. Try it now!

questions.text: Summarize this document in a few sentences.
What are the key points or main arguments in this document?
Who is the author of this document
Can you provide a bullet-point summary of this document?

faq.bodyText: If you can't find the answer don't hesitate to send a mail to
faq.askPDFDescription: AskPDF is an innovative AI-powered platform that transforms how you interact with PDF documents. Simply upload your PDF and start asking questions - our advanced AI will analyze the content and provide instant, accurate answers.
faq.subscriptionDifference: What's the difference between the subscriptions?
faq.subscriptionDifferenceDescription: The difference between each subscription is shown on the pricing page
faq.uploadLimit: Why can't I upload more PDFs?
faq.uploadLimitDescription: You've most likely hit your limit
faq.trialPeriod: Can I get a trial period?
faq.trialPeriodDescription: Yes indeed, for the premium subscription we have a 7-day trial period
faq.fileFormatDescription: AskPDFs currently supports PDF files. We ensure compatibility with most PDF versions and structures, including searchable PDFs.
faq.dataPrivacyDescription: We take data privacy seriously. Your uploaded PDFs are processed securely. All data is encrypted in transit and we do not share your information with third parties.
faq.accuracy: How accurate are the AI responses?
faq.accuracyDescription: Our AI model provides highly accurate responses based on the content of your PDF. However, as with any AI system, we recommend verifying critical information against the original document. The accuracy depends on factors like document quality and clarity of the questions asked.

pricingPage.title: Choose one of our incredible options
pricingPage.freeDesc: An always free option designed for casual users to start interacting with a PDF.
pricingPage.proDesc: For users who want's to extract the most out of their PDF's and maximize their PDF interactions.
pricingPage.ultimateDesc: Advanced PDF features for professional communication needs, including extensive upload options.
